short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skip straight to the recipe on a recipe blog

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Recipeasy saves you precious time in the kitchen by skipping straight to the recipe on a food blog. 

At the touch of a button, it searches out recipe cards hidden in long-winded webpages and automatically scrolls to it, bypassing all the ads and filler. You can even use built-in keyboard shortcuts to save more time!

The aim of this extension is to work well across the highest number of recipe websites, and it’s constantly tested to improve on that goal.

Credit to Seansoft’s popular “Recipe Filter” extension for providing some inspiration for Recipeasy.
